description: A mechanized battalion supervised by Lieutenant Colonel Kojima, which fights as part of the Federation`s Southeast Asia forces during the latter half of the One Year War. The Kojima Battalion is organized into two mobile suit companies, each subdivided into four teams of three mobile suits apiece, as well as an anti-mobile suit infantry company. 2nd Lieutenant Shiro Amada commands the Kojima Battalion`s 08th MS Team.
name: Kojima Daitai
